io.spine.server.tenant

Class CurrentTenant

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.tenant.CurrentTenant

  • @Internal
public class CurrentTenant
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows to obtain a ID of the current tenant when handling a command or a query in a multi-tenant application.
    See Also:
    Multi-Tenant Data Architecture

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void clear()
      Clears the stored value.
      static java.util.Optional<io.spine.core.TenantId> get()
      Obtains the ID of a tenant served in the current thread.
      static void set(io.spine.core.TenantId tenantId)
      Sets the ID of the tenant served in the current thread.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static java.util.Optional<io.spine.core.TenantId> get()
        Obtains the ID of a tenant served in the current thread.
        Returns:
        ID of the tenant or empty Optional if the current thread works not in a multi-tenant context

        Sets the ID of the tenant served in the current thread.
